heading: Today
text: Mostly sunny south, mixing with clouds through NY, and from Rt. 4 north, with a few brief flurries or snow showers near and north of the Quebec border.  Highs in the 30s, some warmer valleys south near 40.  Winds light, becoming south near 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the afternoon west of the Green Mountains.

heading: Tonight
text: Any evening clouds far north giving way to mostly clear skies.  Some periods of clouds west and north late.  Mild south breezes.  Lows in the 20s to low 30s from the Green Mountains west, upper teens and 20s east.  Winds becoming south 10 to 15 mph, gusting 25 to 35 mph, lighter in sheltered valleys east.

heading: Saturday
text: Any early sun giving way to periods of clouds.  A chance of spotty snow or rain showers from the Adirondacks and north of Rt. 2, then some clearing late.  Windy and much milder.  Highs in the low to mid 40s, near 40 far north, falling late.  South winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting 25 to 40 mph, shifting to the northwest late.
